What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Run magarena on a relatively low resolution (below 1366x768 for example) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The normal magarena screen with a scrollbar to allow access to non-visibly areas. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.24 / Ubuntu 11.10

I fount the problem trying to create a custom deck. The buttons for the task
are not visible due to screen size issues. The attached screenshow will give you
a better idea of what i am talking about.
author: [pablo.ca...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100883785716832971309/)
title: Magarena screen is cut off on low resolution displays (netbooks, and old laptops)
content:
_From [pablo.ca...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100883785716832971309/) on April 21, 2012 11:27:36_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Run magarena on a relatively low resolution (below 1366x768 for example) What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The normal magarena screen with a scrollbar to allow access to non-visibly areas. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.24 / Ubuntu 11.10

I fount the problem trying to create a custom deck. The buttons for the task
are not visible due to screen size issues. The attached screenshow will give you
a better idea of what i am talking about.

**Attachment:** [screenshot.png](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=206)
